chemaxon.marvin.paint

Interface DispOptConsts


  • public interface DispOptConsts
    Display option masks and offsets.
    Since:
    Marvin 2.8
    Version:
    5.3, 06/02/2009
    Author:
    Peter Csizmadia, Eva Hollo, Erika Biro
